mapper.select: SELECT e.id AS e_id, e.name AS e_name, e.type AS e_type, e.serial_number AS e_serial_number, e.purchase_date AS e_purchase_date, e.status AS e_status, e.guide_document_path AS e_guide_document_path, e.department_id AS e_department_id, e.admin_user_id AS e_admin_user_id, e.parameters AS e_parameters, e.created_at AS e_created_at, e.created_by AS e_created_by, e.updated_at AS e_updated_at, e.updated_by AS e_updated_by, u.full_name AS u_full_name, u.mobile_phone AS u_mobile_phone FROM equipments e LEFT JOIN users u ON e.admin_user_id = u.id WHERE e.id = #{id}

SELECT e.id AS e_id, e.name AS e_name, e.type AS e_type, e.serial_number AS e_serial_number, e.purchase_date AS e_purchase_date, e.status AS e_status, e.guide_document_path AS e_guide_document_path, e.department_id AS e_department_id, e.admin_user_id AS e_admin_user_id, e.parameters AS e_parameters, e.created_at AS e_created_at, e.created_by AS e_created_by, e.updated_at AS e_updated_at, e.updated_by AS e_updated_by, u.full_name AS u_full_name, u.mobile_phone AS u_mobile_phone FROM equipments e LEFT JOIN users u ON e.admin_user_id = u.id WHERE e.admin_user_id = #{adminUserId} ORDER BY e.created_at DESC
